newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: BankWest sees Budge replacing m.d. Kent.
newsitem.headline: BankWest sees Budge replacing m.d. Kent.

text.p: Bank of Western Australia Ltd (BankWest) said on Friday it had appointed Terry Budge as chief operating officer, effective May 12.

BankWest chairman Ian MacKenzie said it was the intention of the board to appoint Budge as managing director at the start of December this year following the retirement of the current managing director, Warwick Kent, at the end of November.
MacKenzie said Budge would report to Kent until then.
Budge was formerly general manager strategy and integration, Australian financial services at National Australia Bank Ltd.
Budge's previous senior appointments at National Australia Bank included chief economist, general manager group strategic development, state manager Queensland and state manager New South Wales.
